ingredients: 1 lb. extra firm tofu, drained, pressed at least 15 minutes, and cut into 1 inch cubes
2-14 oz. cans coconut milk (I used lite)
¼ cup vegan green curry paste (store bought
1½ tbsp. brown sugar (or sweetener of choice)
2 cups fresh baby corn, cut into 1 inch pieces
½ lb. asparagus spears, cut into 1 inch pieces
¼ cup fresh basil leaves, chopped
